songs.title: Six Feet Under (Aire Atlantica Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Help, I lost myself again
But I remember you
Don't come back, it won't end well
But I wish you'd tell me too

[Chorus]
Our love is six feet under
I can't help but wonder
If our grave was watered by the rain
Would roses bloom?
Could roses bloom?

[Pre-Drop]
Could roses bloom?
Could roses bloom?
I remember you

[Drop]

(Retrace my lips
Erase your touch
It's all too much for me)
(Blow away
Like smoke in air
How can you die carelessly?)

[Chorus]
Our love is six feet under
I can't help but wonder
If our grave was watered by the rain

Would roses bloom?
(They're playing our sound
Laying us down tonight)
Could roses bloom?
(And all of these clouds
Bringing us back to life)
But I remember you

[Drop]

(Retrace my lips
Erase your touch
It's all too much for me)
(Blow away
Like smoke in air
How can you die carelessly?)

I remember you
